tools.name: Microsoft Azure
tools.description: Microsoft Azure is a cloud computing platform offering compute, storage, networking, and managed services across global regions. It provides security, governance, and DevOps integrations to build, deploy, and scale applications and AI workloads.

tools.name: Azure Machine Learning
tools.description: Azure Machine Learning is a managed service for building, training, and deploying ML and generative AI models at scale. It offers MLOps tooling, automated training, model registry, and responsible AI features.

tools.name: Azure OpenAI Service
tools.description: Azure OpenAI Service provides enterprise access to GPT, Phi, and other frontier foundation models with Azure RBAC, network isolation, and responsible AI guardrails. It supports fine-tuning, provisioned throughput, and On Your Data for grounded responses.

tools.name: Azure AI Studio
tools.description: Azure AI Studio (formerly Azure AI Foundry) is the control plane for building generative AI apps with model catalog access, prompt flow, evaluations, deployment endpoints, and governance integrations.

tools.name: Azure AI Agent Service
tools.description: Azure AI Agent Service provides agent runtime, registry, and orchestration capabilities with managed memory, connectors, and tool-calling so developers can compose multi-agent solutions on Azure.

tools.name: Azure API Center
tools.description: Azure API Center is a centralized inventory for discovering, governing, and sharing internal and external APIs. It powers searchable registries, lifecycle tracking, and integration with API Management.

tools.name: Azure AI Search
tools.description: Azure AI Search combines vector, hybrid, and semantic search with integrated indexing pipelines, chunking, enrichment skills, and Azure OpenAI re-rankers for high-quality RAG experiences.

tools.name: Azure AI Document Intelligence
tools.description: Azure AI Document Intelligence (Form Recognizer) extracts structured data, OCR text, tables, and layout insights from scanned documents, PDFs, and images with prebuilt and custom models.

tools.name: Azure Cosmos DB
tools.description: Azure Cosmos DB is a globally distributed, multi-model database with low-latency reads, automatic scaling, and vector/JSON storage options ideal for agent memory and grounding state.

tools.name: Azure Cache for Redis Enterprise
tools.description: Azure Cache for Redis Enterprise offers managed Redis with modules for search and vector similarity, enabling semantic caching, session state, and ultra-low latency agent memory.

tools.name: Azure API Management
tools.description: Azure API Management provides a global gateway with authentication, throttling, versioning, developer portal, and observability to securely expose and govern APIs and model endpoints.

tools.name: Azure Monitor - Application Insights
tools.description: Application Insights captures distributed traces, metrics, and logs for applications and AI workloads with live dashboards, anomaly detection, and cost tracking.

tools.name: Azure SQL Database
tools.description: Azure SQL Database is a fully managed relational database with built-in security, hyperscale storage, and integration with Azure OpenAI for natural-language-to-SQL experiences.

tools.name: LLM Mode;router
tools.description: Azure AI LLM Moderouter orchestrates acontent safety pipelines by routing prompts and responses through policy checks, filtering, and mitigation flows before they dynamically reach downstream models.
